events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred on April 30th involving damage to the front bumper and minor scratches on the left door.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident based on the description of the vehicle collision and damage reported by the customer.
An agent was assigned to the claim promptly to ensure quick handling and maintain positive customer engagement throughout the process.
The claim was acknowledged with a confirmation email to the client, providing details about the next steps in the investigation.
The customer was asked to submit photographs of the damaged vehicle, the police report, and the driver’s license for verification purposes.
Received all requested documentation including accident photos, police report, and proof of insurance, enabling the investigation to proceed smoothly.
The investigation began focusing on the cause and extent of the collision damage, including verifying the accident details with involved parties.
Investigation completed successfully; liability established and damage assessed to cover the necessary repairs as documented.
A settlement offer was issued to the customer reflecting the estimated repair costs and coverages according to the policy terms.
Customer responded expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount and appreciation for the clear communication during the process.
The claim was officially approved by the claims manager, confirming all documentation met the requirements for payment.
Payment was issued to the customer’s account covering the agreed settlement amount for the vehicle repairs.
The claim was formally closed after confirming that all payments were delivered and the customer had no further issues.
The case files and documents were archived securely for future reference as the claim was concluded successfully.
